meanings.definition: A fleet of small ships or boats.
meanings.sent1: The flotillas sailed together in the calm sea.
meanings.sent2: The flotillas of fishing boats returned with their daily catch.
meanings.sent3: The flotillas of rubber ducks in the bathtub made bath time fun.
meanings.sent4: The flotillas of clouds drifted lazily across the sky.
meanings.sent5: The flotillas of colorful paper boats raced in the stream.

meanings.definition: A group of small vessels or vehicles.
meanings.sent1: Tourists enjoyed exploring the flotillas of canoes on the lake.
meanings.sent2: The flotillas of delivery trucks lined up outside the warehouse.
meanings.sent3: The flotillas of shopping carts in the store created a traffic jam.
meanings.sent4: The flotillas of ants marched in a straight line towards the picnic.
meanings.sent5: The flotillas of bicycles parked neatly by the entrance.
